attributes.action: Make Christopher Harris Give Me Catherine Amelia Hartland My A Back
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Christopher, my soon to be ex husband, has decided to take my A. I think this is a disgrace. Please sign below and agree.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
